Career Overview: Engineer-turned-operator with 10+ years in consulting and product leadership; currently leads the flagship product at a 200-person virtualization startup. Built and scaled enterprise software products after earning an MBA from UCLA.
Industry Exposure: Enterprise software and cloud/virtualization (Platform9, VMware); Cybersecurity and IT (Keeper Security; strong MSP experience); Healthcare and payer systems (Anthem claims projects; telehealth startup); ABA clinics and home-based services (Medicaid reimbursement); Healthcare IT and MSP (hospital systems); Public sector systems (California state benefits); Telecom (AT&T projects); Publishing/ecommerce (children's book brand)
Functional Strengths: Product ownership: Led flagship products with large recurring revenue; set strategy, plans, and budgets
Team leadership: Directed engineering, sales, marketing, support, and operations teams to deliver products
Process improvement: Built workflows and SOPs to remove bottlenecks using first-principles thinking
Go-to-market execution: Developed pricing, packaging, and launch plans; enabled channel partners to win accounts
Financial analysis: Built acquisition models to evaluate cash flow and returns; tested different deal structures
Project management: Delivered complex projects across multiple teams and external stakeholders
Deal structuring: Designs seller notes, performance-based terms, and escrow arrangements that meet SBA requirements
Lender coordination: Works with multiple SBA lenders; understands 7(a) vs 504 loans and pari passu structures
Equity fundraising: Created investor materials and secured $200k in commitments
Due diligence management: Coordinates legal, financial, and insurance reviews; sequences work to minimize costs
Vendor selection: Chooses healthcare attorneys and QoE firms based on early risk identification
AI-assisted diligence: Uses LLM tools to reconcile cash to books, flag issues early, and set a working capital peg before paying for QoE
Leadership & Management Experience: Managed 10-person delivery team at Deloitte; led cross-functional squads across product, engineering, and go-to-market. Decision scope included strategy and execution for products with nine-figure recurring revenue. Currently leads flagship product at 200-person startup; hired and onboarded new PM. Coordinates parallel diligence on two acquisitions with multiple lenders, brokers, and advisors.
Unique Abilities (Superpowers): Turns complex problems into simple, repeatable processes; sees the whole system and connects product, operations, and finance; stays calm under pressure and maintains momentum; learns new domains quickly and applies lessons immediately; does deep research fast and converts findings into clear action steps.
Leverages AI to speed analysis and diligence
